anwar manathunga web adawiyen mama karunawen illasitinne komant karannange wachana hakinam sanskaranaya kara palakaranna kiya .me hama kenama kuliyata kahinnanya .kisima sakayak natha .kese ho lankawa adyathmikawa ,aarthikawa dubala kirima amarikawa ,eeshralaya athalu yuropayata awashyawi thibenawa .manda lankawa owunge yuda katayuthuwalata kadima ratak .lankawa dubala wana tharamatama owunge aramunu mudunpath kiraganimata godak pahasuyi .oya halal prashnaya gena enneth owunge patu aramunu mudunpath karagannayi .buddimath pirisak sitina ape lankawe bauddayin kala yuththe siyaluma ratawasiyan jathi aagam beda walin thorawa rate diyunuwa wenuwen kapawi ape anagatha parapurata bankoloth lankawak wenuwata ape muthunmiththan apata thaba giyase swayanposhitha lankawak owunta laba dimata uthsaha kirimayi .api muslim ,kristhiyani demala wirodha walata wayakarana kalaya ,mudal,jiwitha ,lankawe diyunuwata waya karamu .api hama sanwidanayakma ekwi athwal badagena sorakam, sthridushana,allas ,ganika , thrasthawadaya wani dewal lankawen thuran karamu .lankawa batahira sathurangen beraganimu .ewita sama lankikayekutama aathma garuthwayen jiwathwiya hakiyi .ada boho aya kadakappal kari kriyawan karanne dana ho nodana aparate diyunuwa awarudu ganan passata damamin .awarudu pahakata pasuwa lankawe ipadimata sitinnawu bilindath nayakarayeki .
